external_references.source_name: O365 Blog Azure AD Device IDs
external_references.description: Syynimaa, N. (2022, February 15). Stealing and faking Azure AD device identities. Retrieved August 3, 2022.

objects.description: Monitor for attempts to access files that store information about certificates and their associated private keys. For example, personal certificates for users may be stored on disk in folders such as `%APPDATA%\Microsoft\SystemCertificates\My\Certificates\`.(Citation: SpecterOps Certified Pre Owned)(Citation: O365 Blog Azure AD Device IDs)
